actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend chapter 53 of title 5, United States Code, to increase the salaries of the Chairman and members of the Federal Reserve Board.

summary.text: Increases the salaries of: (1) the Chairman of the Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System by reclassifying the position (currently at level II of the Executive Schedule) as a position at level I of the Executive Schedule; and (2) the members of the Board by reclassifying such positions (currently at level III of the Executive Schedule) as positions at level II of the Executive Schedule.

titles.title: A bill to amend chapter 53 of title 5, United States Code, to increase the salaries of the Chairman and members of the Federal Reserve Board.
